decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly pressure the opponent and deal damage efficiently. Utilizing a mix of powerful creatures like Marauding Mako and Vivi Ornitier, along with burn spells like Abrade and Torch the Tower, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and finish the game before they have a chance to stabilize. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Fear of Missing Out and Profet's Eidetic Memory to draw additional cards and maintain momentum. The mana base is designed to support both red and blue spells effectively.

The deck focuses on aggressive play with a Dimir color combination, utilizing cards that disrupt opponents while building up a strong board presence. It includes various creatures with abilities that hinder the opponent, as well as spells that can control the game state. The main strategy is to maintain pressure with aggressive creatures while using disruptive spells to control the opponent's resources and protect your own board. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm opponents and close out the game before they can establish their own game plan.

The deck focuses on control and manipulation of resources through a mix of counter spells, removal, card draw, and life gain. By disrupting the opponent's game plan and slowing down aggressive strategies, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and win through card advantage and efficient removal spells. The use of a variety of spells allows the player to adapt to different situations and maintain control of the game. The deck also includes a limited number of win conditions to close out the game once the opponent has been neutralized.

This deck focuses on aggressive gameplay with a strong emphasis on dealing direct damage to the opponent quickly. It utilizes powerful creatures like Nova Hellkite and Burnout Bashtronaut, along with burn spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike to quickly reduce the opponent's life total. The deck also has a mix of creatures and spells that can provide additional damage or protection, allowing for versatility in different game situations. With a focus on speed and efficiency, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

The main concept of this Dimir Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of low-cost, evasive creatures and disruptive spells. By quickly establishing a board presence and disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Spyglass Siren and Shoot the Sheriff, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain control of the game. Utilizing cards like Enduring Curiosity and Gloomlake Verge for card advantage, along with powerful finishers like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares, the deck looks to close out games efficiently before the opponent can stabilize.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively deal damage to the opponent using a combination of fast creatures and burn spells. By quickly establishing a board presence with creatures like Razorkin Needlehead and Burnout Bashtronaut, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. The burn spells like Lightning Strike and Burst Lightning provide additional reach and removal options, while cards like Nova Hellkite and Obliterating Bolt offer powerful finishers. Overall, the deck focuses on applying pressure early and maintaining it throughout the game.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively control the board with cheap and efficient spells while also utilizing creatures with evasion to deal damage quickly. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of direct damage spells, card advantage engines, and resilient threats that can be difficult to deal with. By combining these elements, the deck can put pressure on the opponent early and maintain that pressure throughout the game, ultimately leading to a quick victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing a combination of aggressive creatures and versatile spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing cards like Into the Flood Maw and Marauding Mako for early aggression, along with burn spells like Abrade and Torch the Tower for removal, this deck aims to control the field and push for damage. Multiversal Passage helps fix mana while Steamcore Scholar and Vivi Ornitier provide additional support. Fear of Missing Out and Proft's Eidetic Memory offer card advantage, while Winternight Stories and Agatha's Soul Cauldron provide late-game reach and power.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with a combination of creatures and removal spells. By using cards like Azure Beastbinder and Spyglass Siren, along with removal spells like Bitter Triumph and Tragic Trajectory, the goal is to control the board while still dealing damage to the opponent. Cards like Cecil, Dark Knight and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares provide additional pressure and disruption to the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes some card draw and life gain options to help maintain momentum in the aggro strategy.

The main focus of this Selesnya Aggro deck is to quickly and efficiently swarm the board with creatures to overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing low-cost creatures and various summon abilities, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and establish board presence early on. The deck also incorporates cards that provide additional benefits such as lifegain and card draw to maintain momentum and outvalue the opponent. Overall, the key concept is to maintain a fast-paced aggressive strategy that can quickly close out games before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. The deck aims to establish board control early on and maintain pressure throughout the game. With a strong mana base and a mix of low-cost creatures and burn spells, this deck seeks to win the game quickly by dealing damage to the opponent's life total as efficiently as possible. Additionally, the inclusion of cards like Nova Hellkite and Soulstone Sanctuary provide additional win conditions and resilience against removal spells.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on utilizing low-cost creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage efficiently. The deck includes a mix of evasion abilities, removal spells, and card draw to maintain pressure on the opponent and control the board. By combining aggressive creatures like Gloomlake Verge and Floodpits Drowner with disruptive spells like Spyglass Siren and Shoot the Sheriff, the deck aims to consistently apply pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan, ultimately leading to a swift victory.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful burn spells. By quickly playing creatures like Marauding Mako and Vivi Ornitier, along with burn spells like Obliterating Bolt and Abrade, the deck aims to deal damage to the opponent quickly and efficiently. The deck also includes cards like Winternight Stories and Profit's Eidetic Memory to draw cards and maintain card advantage. Overall, the deck focuses on dealing damage fast and efficiently to secure victory.

The deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage and win the game. It aims to control the board with efficient removal spells like Burst Lightning and Lightning Strike, while also putting pressure on the opponent with strong creatures like Nova Hellkite and Razorkin Needlehead. By maintaining a high tempo and constantly applying pressure, the deck aims to close out the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize or mount a comeback.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on aggressively pressuring opponents using a combination of evasive creatures like Spyglass Siren and powerful removal spells like Tragic Trajectory. By efficiently controlling the board and dealing damage early on, the deck aims to keep opponents on the back foot while applying consistent pressure to secure a quick victory. Additionally, cards like Enduring Curiosity and Multiversal Passage provide card advantage and flexibility, allowing the deck to maintain momentum and adapt to various situations during the game. Furthermore, cards like Cecil, Dark Knight and Phantom Interference offer disruptive elements to disrupt opponent's strategy.

This deck focuses on a fast-paced aggressive strategy using a combination of creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing evasive creatures like Spyglass Siren and Azure Beastbinder, as well as disruptive cards such as Bitter Triumph and Phantom Interference, this deck aims to control the board and apply pressure early on. Additionally, Enduring Curiosity and Malcolm, Alluring Scoundrel provide card draw and resource advantage, while cards like Restless Reef and Floodpits Drowner help maintain tempo. Overall, this deck aims to be proactive and efficient in its gameplay.
